utils.sgtlog

This is a minimal class providing access to log methods and constants.

This class contains a few logging functions for each possible log level listed below.

  • fatal
  • error
  • notice
  • info
  • debug
  • debug0 to debug5

Note that in the previous list “debug” is an alias for “debug0”.  For each log level xxx we have access to the following static functions.

Note : For each function listed below the “xxxx” placeholder should be replaced with one of the level names, for instance

local log = require "utils.sgtlog"
log.info("Hello world")
log.warn_t("Logger","This is a warning.")

The class also contains a list of all available levels in Class.levels.

Summary
utils.sgtlogThis is a minimal class providing access to log methods and constants.
Functions
xxxxLog a simple message.
xxxx_vLog a simple message when verbose is enabled.
xxxx_tLog a message with trace.
xxxx_tvLog a message with trace when verbose is enabled.

Functions

xxxx

function Class:xxxx(msg)

Log a simple message.  This method will send the message as a simple log to the <sgt.LogManager> singleton.

Parameters

msgThe message string to send.

xxxx_v

function Class:xxxx_v(msg)

Log a simple message when verbose is enabled.  This method will send the message as a simple log to the <sgt.LogManager> singleton.

Parameters

msgThe message string to send.

xxxx_t

function Class:xxxx_t(trace,
msg)

Log a message with trace.  Will send the log to the <sgt.LogManager> with a given trace.

Parameters

traceThe trace string to use for this message
msgThe message string to log.

xxxx_tv

function Class:xxxx_tv(trace,
msg)

Log a message with trace when verbose is enabled.  Will send the log to the <sgt.LogManager> with a given trace.

Parameters

traceThe trace string to use for this message
msgThe message string to log.

msg)
Log a message with trace.
